attributes.description:
KIA RIO 1.2 MT LS
Beautiful Rio in immaculate condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Sensors to assist with parking. Manual transmission that allows for a smooth drive. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this classic for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.
